name: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions
desc: Constants that define restrictions on the playback of interstitial content.

items.name: static var constrainsSeekingForwardInPrimaryContent: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions
items.desc: Indicates that the event doesn’t allow seeking forward within an interstitial item.

items.name: static var requiresPlaybackAtPreferredRateForAdvancement: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions
items.desc: Indicates that the event doesn’t allow advancing the current time within an interstitial item.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a restriction with an integer.
